description.value:
(EX)

Undead are immune to the following effects, unless the effect specifies it works against undead creatures.

  • Bleed, death effects, @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.GnEF27Oot3zqTaBQ]{Disease}, mind-affecting effects, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.NV4qXRDgb7zTNkW2]{Paralysis}, @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Poison}, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.3iTdt2NRgIyrychR]{Sleep}, and @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunning}.
  • Ability damage, ability drain, energy drain, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.33ynSbmexuxC3cAQ]{Exhaustion}, @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.JGFn4MrDZ6X5vrzU]{Fatigue}, negative levels, and nonlethal damage.
  • Any effect that requires a Fortitude save (unless the effect works on objects or is harmless).
